K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:15b-0: @15b rgya gar skad du; a'arya aashta mah'a pr'a ya t'a r'a ni n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:15b-2: 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:15b-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:15b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:15b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dril la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:15b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:15b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag @16a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-2: de bzhin gshegs bzhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa med par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-8: ra na ko te aa bha y'a kalpe /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-14: aa nanta tsakshu sa mutga te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-16: rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-19: rjes su yi rang pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-20: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa de 'jigs pa brgyad po sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-21: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-22: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-23: yi dvags kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-24: bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-25: skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-26: nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-27: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16a-28: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16b-0: sems rnam par g-yeng @16b ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16b-1: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16b-2: zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16b-3: sbrul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16b-5: sing dhyan tu me man tra p'a da sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-095-003:16b-6: 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
